page.title: 15MEDIA
page.content: A television survey revealed that most people prefer soap operas. Dallas came top but Coronation Street was a close second because it is so true to life and related to the Stretford area. Comedy programmes were also popular. The favourite radio station in the area is piccadilly, which shows that people are interested in what is going on locally. Young people liked Piccadilly, older people preferred Radios 4 and 2. Many people wanted fewer news programmes and documentaries. Nearly everyone said that they would not pay extra for cable TV. Breakfast television is popular. Most people preferred ITV to BBC because of the commercials. It was felt that the BBC should take commercials.
